Title: ReportingOnDashboard for Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2011
Description: Add CRM Reports on Dashboard or Form in CRM 2011.
HomeWiki:
This solution lets you add Reports on Dashboard or Forms of CRM 2011. Out of box, Dashboards provides capability to add Charts, Lists, Web Resources and IFrames.
With the use of Web Resource, this solution lets you add Report control on dashboard.
Note that it does some client side Un-Supported dom manipulation to render the report in clean and nicer way. Here's the screenshot on how it looks:
